alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weld and northeastern Boulder Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mead, or 19 miles southwest of Greeley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Longmont, Firestone, Milliken, Berthoud, Mead, Platteville and Gilcrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County
